column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Regardless of culpability
column2: I am sorry you had to deal with the delay
column3: and if you are willing/able to give us another chance -- and I hope you do -- please ask for me
column5: and we will make sure your experience is vastly superior to this one. But if you decide otherwise
column7: and can only ask that you accept our sincere apology.
